ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.

disabled.description: When disabled, an API Authorization has no effect.

importHash.description: The hash of the structure used to compare with new import version.

importLabel.description:
The user-defined import label that allows the system to group resources from the
same import operation.

name.description: The name of the authorization rule.

permissions.description: The individual permissions. Only works if role is Custom.

subject.description: A tag expression that identifies the authorized user(s).

targetNamespaces.description:
Defines the namespace or namespaces in which the permission for subject should
apply. If empty, the object's namespace will be used.

updateTime.description: Last update date of the object.
